sentences.sContent: The wall is covered all over with ivy.
sentences.sContent_eng: The wall is covered all over with ivy.

sentences.sContent: This ivy was green at a time when other ivies had pooped out.
sentences.sContent_eng: This ivy was green at a time when other ivies had pooped out.
sentences.sCn: 这棵常春藤在其他常春藤都已凋谢时却仍然是绿的。

phrases.pCn: 长春藤联盟；长春藤名牌大学
毒葛；接触毒漆引起的皮疹

words.tran: 常春藤遮盖着的；长满常春藤的

trans.tranOther: a climbing plant with dark green shiny leaves
